DOC.brief_summary: This study design refine aetiological cause cancer head neck investigate way human papillomavirus life-style factor cause head neck cancer . This study determine factor affect treatment cancer . All patient attend Head Neck Clinic Princess Alexandra Hospital invite complete risk factor questionnaire give consent clinical data tissue sample available future research activity . The risk factor questionnaire base exist validated instrument develop QIMR Berghofer Medical Research Institute Cancer Control Group , collect standardise information relate demographic causal factor ( tobacco alcohol intake ) , risk modifier ( dentition , asprin non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAIDS ) , height , weight , physical activity , diet quality etc ) behaviour ( oral sex etc )
DOC.brief_title: The Princess Alexandra Hospital QIMR Berghofer Medical Research Institute Head Neck Cancer Study
DOC.detailed_description: Data collect use simple four-page paper-based questionnaire . Information collect include age , sex , height weight ( age 20 , current age , heavy ever ) , history cancer ( partner ) . Questions recreational physical activity , smoke history alcohol consumption , acid reflux , heartburn , denture use tonsillectomy , frequency use paracetamol , antihistamine NSAIDS . The questionnaire also ask participant detailed question sexual behaviour history comfortable give information .
DOC.criteria: All patient present Head Neck Cancer Clinic Princess Alexandra Hospital Brisbane Australia .
